title: tvOS 15.4 and HomePod 15.4 RC version now available, here’s everything new
content:
After five beta versions with lots of new features, Apple is finally seeding tvOS 15.4 and HomePod 15.4 RC to developers ahead of next week’s final release.

more…

The post tvOS 15.4 and HomePod 15.4 RC version now available, here’s everything new appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: After five beta versions, Apple is finally seeding tvOS 15.4 and HomePod 15.4 RC to developers ahead of next week's final release.
